original_title: How to Kill 14 People Without Saying a Word
overview: This is a story of how the lips of America became sealed. How we stood by and let our minds be censored. How countless lives were lost in the name of comfort and correctness. This is how we killed fourteen people in San Bernardino, CA on December 2nd, 2015 without saying a single word.
title: How to Kill 14 People Without Saying a Word
